item.title: Best practices for HP EVA, vSphere 4 and Round Robin multi-pathing
item.description: To get your HP EVA storage system and VMware ESX hosts storage balances you get a better performance. Here are some Best practices. The VMware vSphere and the HP EVA 4x00, 6x00 and 8x00 series are ALUA compliant. ALUA compliant means in simple words that it is not needed to manually identify preferred I/O paths between VMware ESX hosts and the storage controllers. When you create a new Vdisk on the HP EVA the LUN is set default set to No Preference.
